text: (Allah) ni we ukwiye ijambo ry’ukuri (ry’uko nta yindi mana ibaho ikwiye gusengwa by’ukuri usibye we). Naho babandi basenga ibitari we, ntacyo bibasubiza na kimwe, mbese ni nk’umuntu urambura amaboko ye ayerekeza ku mazi (ari kure ye) kugira ngo amugere mu kanwa, nyamara adashobora kumugeraho. Kandi ubusabe bw’abahakanyi nta kindi buri cyo usibye kuba ari ubuyobe
